aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.heading: ABOUT US
aboutUs.description1: At Floral Whispers, we're more than just a flower shop; we're your partners in celebrating life's special moments.
aboutUs.description2: With a passion for perfection and a love for all things floral, we dedicate ourselves to creating handcrafted bouquets that embody nature's elegance.
aboutUs.foundedBy: Founded by Aruzhan Yermek in 2018, Floral Whispers started as a dream nurtured in the heart of Astana.
aboutUs.grownOverYears: Over the years, we've grown, learned, and bloomed alongside the flowers we adore.
